blocks.heading: Ship a SharePoint your people actually use
blocks.description: Your documents are scattered. Your teams are frustrated. Your SharePoint investment isn't delivering. SSW's SharePoint experts customize solutions that fit your business; not force your business to fit SharePoint.

blocks.heading: Why Most SharePoint Implementations Fail
blocks.description: Many organizations struggle with data scattered across disparate systems. While SharePoint aims to solve this, a default setup rarely suffices. We centralize your documents, data, and processes, enforcing information management policies and automating critical business workflows to boost efficiency across your entire organization.

features.heading: Modern intranets & team sites
features.description: Consistent hub navigation, branded themes, clear IA, and â€˜important placesâ€™ that help new starters and veterans find work fast.

features.heading: Process automation
features.description: Leave requests, expense claims, approvals. All the recurring processes implemented with lists, Power Automate, and Power Apps.

cards.heading: Team Collaboration Sites
cards.description: Create productive team sites for every project, department, and division. Share files, data, news, and resources with powerful collaboration tools that your teams will actually want to use.

cards.heading: Intranet Portals
cards.description: Build cohesive intranet sites that inform and engage employees. Share resources, applications, and company news in one centralized hub that drives organizational efficiency.

cards.heading: Enterprise Search
cards.description: Stop wasting hours searching for documents. Powerful search capabilities and intelligent discovery help your teams find information, expertise, and insights instantly.

blocks.heading: Tech wisdom from the trenches
blocks.body: At SSW, weâ€™ve been building enterprise projects for thirty years: We're thought leaders in software architecture, and document all our learning for free on the SSW Rules and SSW TV.

cards.heading: SharePoint Sites for Admins - Tips for Managing SharePoint with Warwick Leahy
cards.description: In the days of classic SharePoint, subsites were a popular way of organising your intranet. Modern SharePoint architecture leans toward a flatter hierarchy, where sub-sites are generally not recommended.

cards.description: See what makes SharePoint Search a powerful way to find anything throughout your organization.

cards.altText: AU  Skip navigation Search    Create   Avatar image SharePoint agents - What's new and what's next | Microsoft 365 Community Conference 2025
cards.heading: SharePoint agents - What's new and what's next
cards.description: In this session, we will recap key product best practices for getting the most out of SharePoint, OneDrive and custom agents with SharePoint Embedded. We'll also unveil our roadmap for the months ahead as we continue to innovate how agents support individual workers, teams, and organizations.

accordionItems.label: What's the difference between SharePoint configuration and customization?
accordionItems.content:
Most consultants simply turn features on and off within SharePoint's standard capabilitiesâ€¦ that's configuration.

At SSW, we go further with customization: Our .NET developers build bespoke solutions, integrations, and workflows that extend SharePoint to match your exact business processes. For example, if you need to automatically sync 2,000 client records from your CRM into individual SharePoint portals, we build custom synchronization tools rather than force you into manual workarounds.

accordionItems.label: How long does a typical SharePoint implementation take?
accordionItems.content: It varies significantly based on scope. Simple implementations with out-of-the-box features (team sites, document libraries, basic workflows) can be deployed in weeks. Complex enterprise solutions requiring custom development, legacy system integration, and change management may take several months. During your initial meeting, we'll discuss your requirements and provide a realistic timeline. Our approach is transparent; we'll tell you exactly what's involved and how long each phase will take.

accordionItems.label: What happens in the free initial meeting?
accordionItems.content: Our sales manager and a SharePoint consultant will meet with you to understand your business requirements and current challenges. We'll discuss pain points like scattered documents, manual processes, or integration needs. Then we'll assess whether SharePoint is the right fit and provide honest recommendations. Many common business needs (expense claims, leave requests, approval workflows) can be handled with SharePoint's out-of-the-box features. For more complex scenarios, we'll explain how custom development can solve your specific challenges. There's no pressure or obligationâ€¦ just expert guidance to help you make the right decision.

accordionItems.label: Should we choose SharePoint Online or on-premises?
accordionItems.content: For most organizations, SharePoint Online (part of Microsoft 365) is the better choice. You eliminate server hardware, maintenance costs, IT overhead, and manual upgrades while gaining automatic updates, enterprise security, and global availability. However, some organizations with specific compliance requirements or legacy system dependencies may still need on-premises deployment. During your free initial meeting, we'll assess your specific needs and recommend the best approach for your situation.

blocks.heading: Talk to us about your SharePoint project
blocks.description: Connect with our Account Managers to discuss how we can help.
